title: Mont Sainte-Victoire-formal intent of the artist

content.question: In Mont Sainte-Victoire, Paul Cézanne sought to explore the

choices.label: fleeting atmospheric effects of changing light
coexistence of multiple viewpoints in a single scene
presentation of space as an extension of the painter’s psyche
harmonious effects of an analogous color scheme

content.answer: coexistence of multiple viewpoints in a single scene

topic.text: 4.2: Purpose and Audience in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain how the possible intent, purpose, and/or function shape the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
